p: Tetracycline hydrochloride, miconazole nitrate, 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) and (±)-6-hydroxy-2,5,7,8-tetramethylchromane-2-carboxylic acid (Trolox) were purchased from Source Leaf Biology Co. (Shanghai, China). Pentadecane, potassium persulfate and 2,2′-azino-bis(3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6-sulfonic acid) (ABTS) were purchased from Meilun Biology Co. (Dalian, China). Iron ion reduction capacity kit was purchased from Congyi Biology Co. (Shanghai, China). All other chemical reagents and solvents were of analytical grade. α-Pinene (99%) and α-terpineol (97%) were purchased from Shandong West Asia Chemical Industry Co. (Linyi City, China). Verbenone (97%) and terpinolene (98%) were purchased from Beijing Bailingwei Technology Co. (Beijing, China).
